channel.title: Bio on Austin Herrick
channel.description: Recent content in Bio on Austin Herrick

item.title: Projects
item.description: See below to learn about my recent personal projects - A Dynamic Model, Elo Approach to Magic Draft Analysis # Paper Text Github Repo In this project, I investigate the win rate anti-correlation generated by record-based matchmaking in a tournament setting, as opponent skill level reacts in real time to a competitor’s current performance. To do this, I constructed a dynamic model which simulates thousands of iterated Magic: The Gathering draft tournaments by matching players against each other based on current record.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Below are publications I authored, coauthored, or to which I contributed key research. Research contributions are noted in their own section. Published or Working Papers Berkovich, Costa, Herrick, (2022) “Immigration and the Macroeconomy”. PWBM Working Paper Series. Available here Churchill, Biderman, Herrick, (2020) “Magic: The Gathering is Turing Complete”. The Proceedings of the 10th International Conference on Fun with Algorithms. Available here Penn Wharton Budget Model, Briefs
